message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really appreciate it! I'm offering it to you for $90. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $75?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $75 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $85. This would still be a great deal for you, considering the value of the product. Let me know what you think!
